mapper.select: /*decideMapper.selectDecideMain*/ SELECT B.BU_NO AS buNo, B.BU_TITLE AS buTitle, B.BU_ADDRESS AS buAddress, B.BU_MAIN_IMG AS buMainImg FROM BUSINESS B INNER JOIN ROOM R ON B.BU_NO = R.BU_NO WHERE B.BU_MAIN_IMG IS NOT NULL AND B.APPROVAL = 'Y' AND B.BU_NO = #{buNo} AND ROWNUM = 1

/*decideMapper.selectReviewScore*/ SELECT NVL(ROUND(AVG(V.STAR_SCORE), 1), 0) AS starScore FROM BUSINESS B INNER JOIN ROOM R ON B.BU_NO = R.BU_NO LEFT JOIN REVIEW V ON V.USING_ROOM = R.ROOM_NO WHERE B.APPROVAL = 'Y' AND B.BU_NO = #{buNo}

/*decideMapper.selectuserStarScore*/ SELECT ROUND(R.STAR_SCORE, 1) AS userStarScore FROM REVIEW R JOIN ROOM RO ON RO.ROOM_NO = R.USING_ROOM JOIN BUSINESS B ON B.BU_NO = RO.BU_NO WHERE R.REVIEW_AVAILABLE = 'Y' AND B.BU_NO = #{buNo}

/*decideMapper.selectDecideRoom*/ SELECT R.ROOM_NO AS roomNo, B.BU_NO AS buNo, R.ROOM_H_COUNT AS roomHCount, R.ROOM_PRICE AS roomPrice, R.ROOM_NAME AS roomName, R.ROOM_INFO AS roomInfo, IMG.FILE_PATH AS filePath, IMG.ORIGIN_NAME AS originName, IMG.FILE_LEVEL AS fileLevel FROM ROOM R LEFT JOIN ROOM_IMG IMG ON R.ROOM_NO = IMG.ROOM_NO INNER JOIN BUSINESS B ON B.BU_NO = R.BU_NO WHERE B.BU_NO = #{buNo}

/*decideMapper.selectDecideReview*/ SELECT R.REVIEW_NO AS reviewNo, R.REVIEW_WRITER AS reviewWriter, M.USER_NAME AS userName, TO_CHAR(R.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS createDate, R.USING_ROOM AS usingRoom, RO.ROOM_NAME AS roomName, RO.ROOM_INFO AS roomInfo, R.REVIEW_CONTENT AS reviewContent, R.REVIEW_CONTENT_REPLY AS reviewContentReply FROM REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER M ON M.USER_NO = R.REVIEW_WRITER JOIN ROOM RO ON RO.ROOM_NO = R.USING_ROOM JOIN BUSINESS B ON B.BU_NO = RO.BU_NO WHERE R.REVIEW_AVAILABLE = 'Y' AND B.BU_NO = #{buNo}
mapper.insert: /*decideMapper.insertReview*/ INSERT INTO REVIEW( REVIEW_NO, STAR_SCORE, REVIEW_WRITER, CREATE_DATE, REVIEW_CONTENT ) VALUES( SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL, #{starScore}, #{reviewWriter}, #{createDate}, #{reviewContent} )
mapper.select: /*decideMapper.selectCartList*/ SELECT C.USER_NO AS userNo, C.ROOM_NO AS roomNo, R.ROOM_NAME AS roomName, R.ROOM_PRICE AS roomPrice, RI.FILE_PATH AS filePath, RI.ORIGIN_NAME AS originName, C.BU_NO AS buNo FROM CART C LEFT JOIN ROOM R ON C.ROOM_NO = R.ROOM_NO LEFT JOIN ROOM_IMG RI ON R.ROOM_NO = RI.ROOM_NO WHERE C.USER_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: /*decideMapper.insertCartList*/ INSERT INTO CART (USER_NO, ROOM_NO, BU_NO, CART_CHECK_IN, CART_CHECK_OUT) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{roomNo}, #{buNo}, #{cartCheckIn}, #{cartCheckOut})
